alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 3:58PM CDT until July 22 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Gosper County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Furnas County in south central Nebraska... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Holbrook, or 29 miles southwest of Lexington, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Holbrook around 410 PM CDT. Arapahoe around 415 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Beaver City and Hendley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
